Package Modules

Class BookingModule

Object
BookingModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModuleInterface
public class BookingModule extends Object implements ModuleInterface
Represents the Module for MovieGoers to book seats.
Since:
2022-11-11
Version:
1.0
Author:
Chay Hui Xiang

    • BookingModule

      public BookingModule(Scanner sc, MovieGoer movieGoer)
      Creates a new BookingModule to query the user for their booking options.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner to query for user's inputs.
      movieGoer - MovieGoer who is booking a Seat with the BookingModule.

    • calculatePrice

      private double calculatePrice(MovieType movieType, CinemaType cinemaClass, AgeType movieGoerAge, DayType showingDayType, SeatType seatType, LocalDateTime showTime)
      Algorithm to determine the price of the MovieTicket.
      Parameters:
      movieType - type of the Movie booked (ie. REGULAR, 3D, BLOCKBUSTER).
      cinemaClass - class of the Cinema booked (ie. GOLD_GLASS, DELUXE, REGULAR).
      movieGoerAge - age class of the MovieGoer who is booking the MovieTicket (ie. CHILD, ADULT, SENIOR).
      showingDayType - reflects whether the Movie is aired/shown on a WEEKDAY/WEEKEND/PUBLIC_HOLIDAY.
      seatType - type of the Seat booked (ie. REGULAR, COUPLE, ELITE, ULTIMA).
      showTime - time for which the Showing will be aired.
      Returns:
      calculated price of the MovieTicket.
